skills.name: database-operations
skills.description: Manage music track database operations including CRUD operations, queries, and analytics

skills.name: music-extraction
skills.description: Extract music tracks from podcast episodes using chapters, value splits, and content analysis

skills.name: rss-parsing
skills.description: Parse podcast RSS feeds and extract metadata including episodes, chapters, and music track information

skills.name: v4v-resolution
skills.description: Resolve Value4Value Lightning Network payment information for music tracks and artists

next_steps: Run "task-master list" to see new skill tasks
Run "task-master next" to start implementing skills
Use "task-master expand --id=<skill-task-id> --research" to break down skill implementation
